text:
If on Offeror must possess a Business Tax Registration Certificate issued by the Tax Collector, but has failed to obtain one, the Contracting Officer shall not execute the contract, except in case of emergency as defined in Section 
21.15 of this Chapter. 
(Added by Ord. 156-99, File No. 990743, App. 6/2/99)

heading.catch_text: CONTRACTORS REQUIRED TO OBTAIN BUSINESS TAX REGISTRATION CERTIFICATE.
